review.reviewBody: so so good good portions and went above and beyond. Lasagna is super hearty yummy and the Caprese Salad is so refreshing everything 10/10
In a previous review, I commented on the salt in the dish. I see that the chef has dialled the salt back a bit. The dish is much better for it, and thanks!

Best lasagna I've had in my life. 


Please teach other restaurants too.

Thin lasagna sheets, amazing bechamel sauce. 

just kinda Expensive.

Perfect Lasagna. 

I tried 4 olives yesterday and ive tried lasagnas from 5 different places this month. 

To

Marcello's has been my favourite restaurant with my favourite dish for 15 years or so. The ai quattro formaggi gnocchi. I get it every time and it has never disappointed. Their food is consistently amazing and it's the best italian joint in town
